name: Volanto
description:
We are a software company (software house) based in Tri-Cty, operating since 2013. We have been working on complex realization of ICT projects, from design (concepts) through programming to information systems implementation. We cooperate with our clients in terms of systems maintenance and development. Additionally, we conduct IT audits, with respect to the code quality, efficiency and application safety, as well as advise our clients on ICT implementation. 
 
Initially, the company comprised 6 people. Since the beginning of our company, we have been constantly expanding our team. Currently, we are a team of experts specializing in web browser systems (mostly in Java and PHP technologies) and mobile systems (iOS and Android) comprising over 40 people. 
 
The main area of our activity are services connected with ICT market: 
- developing mobile applications,
- developing web applications,
- building dedicated systems to conduct the business processes of our clients.
- IT consulting.
